content:
Stocked with top shelf spirits, local herbs and produce, our bar and lounge is the perfect place to begin or end your evening. Relax in the sensual lighting as you enjoy a seasonal blend mixed up by our expert mixologists, or take a glass of Topping Rose Rosé outdoors to drink up the fresh air. We look forward to serving you.

The Topping Rose Bar and Lounge is also available for Semi-Private Events & Meetings.
Email: trhevents@toppingrosehouse.com
